Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 19 Mar 2019Not really what you described.Google will be doing a "netflix" of games where you do not need to download or install anything. Just play on your browser like how you would watch netflix.0 comments0
